shrimp.name: Wolff
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Wolff diffuse model for smooth dielectric surfaces, based in the paper "Improved Diffuse Reflection Models for Computer Vision", by Lawrence B. Wolff, Shree K. Nayar, and Michael Oren. The ior parameter usually should be in the range 1.2-2.0. The diffuse color value is passed to the aov_surfacecolor, and the diffuse value to the aov_diffuse AOV presets.
